title: Reddit
cleaned_text: Meditation [r/Meditation](/r/Meditation/) This community is for sharing experiences, stories and instruction relating to the practice of meditation. Just saw this while I was in the play store. I'm just about to do my first meditation on it, but the app is really nicely designed, that's about all I know so far. I'm on Android so not sure if the promotion is available on app store or different locations. But worth
